short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upload firmware to FlipRobot Device from Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Before start using the various functionalities in FlipCloud (e.g. ActionScript and FlipCode), please install the FlipRobot Service Tool to download or reset FlipRobot firmware.
